name: Kir Royale Sangria
description: Bubbly, playful, and slightly grown up: a sangria made from rosé champagne and crème de cassis, full of frozen strawberries, blackberries, and red and black currants. Just in time for Bastille Day.
recipeIngredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle of dry sparkling rosé, ice cold
2 cups frozen mixed berries, straight from the freezer

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rosé, crème de cassis, simple syrup, sparkling water, and frozen berries in a large pitcher. Serve immediately.
